trans-unit.source: Specifies the context keyword for a class or member.
trans-unit.target: 指定类或成员的上下文关键字。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Help keyword for a class is given by the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，给定类的帮助关键字<xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值。

trans-unit.source: For members, the Help keyword is given by the full name of the type that declared the property, plus the property name itself.
trans-unit.target: 对于成员，声明属性的类型的完整名称加上属性名称本身由给定的 Help 关键字。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: The class keyword is "System.Windows.Forms.Button", but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property keyword is "System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text", because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is declared on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> class itself; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> class inherits the property.
trans-unit.target: 类关键字是"System.Windows.Forms.Button"，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性关键字是"System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text"，因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上声明属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=nameWithType>类，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType>类本身;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType>类继承属性。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is declared on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, so its keyword is "System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult".
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上声明属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType>类，因此其关键字是"System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult"。

trans-unit.source: When the Help system gets the keywords, it will first look at <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 当帮助系统获取的关键字时，它将首先看一下<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: At the class level, it will return the string specified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 在类级别，它将返回指定的字符串<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: This will not be used for members of the type in question, which will still reflect the declaring type's actual full name, plus the member name.
trans-unit.target: 这将不用于所涉及的类型，它仍反映的声明类型的实际的完整名称，加上成员名称的成员。

trans-unit.source: This attribute supports strongly typed classes that have associated common documentation but distinct Help IDs.
trans-unit.target: 此属性支持具有相关联的常见文档但帮助 Id 的不同状态的强类型的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override this Help system behavior by placing the attribute on the member itself.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何通过在该成员本身上放置该属性重写此帮助系统行为。

trans-unit.source: These are the keywords for the following class, called `DemoComponent`:
trans-unit.target: 这些是调用类的关键字`DemoComponent`:

trans-unit.source: Class keyword: "`System.ComponentModel.Component`" (`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent`)
trans-unit.target: Class 关键字:"`System.ComponentModel.Component`"(`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent`)

trans-unit.source: Property1 keyword: "`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent.Property1`" (default)
trans-unit.target: Property1 关键字:"`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent.Property1`"（默认值）

trans-unit.source: Property2 keyword: "`SomeNamespace.SomeOtherClass.Property2`" (`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent.Property2`)
trans-unit.target: Property2 关键字:"`SomeNamespace.SomeOtherClass.Property2`"(`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent.Property2`)

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> class to specify a context keyword.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>类，以指定的上下文关键字。

trans-unit.source: For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的完整说明，请参阅[如何： 应用 Windows 窗体控件中的特性](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword value.
trans-unit.target: “帮助”关键字值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyword" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyword" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type from which the Help keyword will be taken.
trans-unit.target: 将采用“帮助”关键字的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class from the given type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化给定类型的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword will be set to the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> property of `t`.
trans-unit.target: 帮助关键字将设置为<xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>属性`t`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="t" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="t" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the default value for <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> 的默认值为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see langword="true" /> 等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two instances of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> are equal if their Help keywords are equal.
trans-unit.target: 两个实例<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>相等，如果其帮助关键字是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help keyword supplied by this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取由此特性提供的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword supplied by this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此特性提供的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the Help keyword is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定“帮助”关键字是否为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Help keyword is <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果“帮助”关键字为 <see langword="true" />，则为 <see langword="null" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
